reviewText: Jaime Avalos is one of my favorite researchers in the field of Bigfoot Research and his knowledge is vast and the film, the locations, and the evidence he accrues is in places no one ever dares to go. This video was a crash course education, as well as breathtaking to watch. He knows the subject well and he is one of the most ethical researchers out there. If he shares knowledge, I listen.
How someone gave this five stars, I do not know.  It's a short little film that discovers nothing and is a waste of time and money.
